job_title: Student Term Position with Imperial Oil
job_description: Discover what’s possible.There’s more than one way to make a difference. If you’re a student in Engineering, Science, Business or related disciplines, explore the possibilities at Imperial. Join a team that’s working towards creating a better future.See where your education positions you for success at imperialoil.ca/careersYour initial role with Imperial will be the first of many toward a future filled with challenge, opportunity and accomplishment. Beyond the many career choices available, our supportive culture of continuous learning and development empowers you to achieve your full potential.Imperial has consolidated all of our student engineering positions into one job posting. This will ease your application process and allow us to determine where you best fit amongst our many student term opportunities. Check us out online! youtube.com/imperialoiltwitter.com/imperialoil (@ImperialOil)linkedin.com/company/imperial-oil
job_requirements: Please ensure you submit a copy of your most recent unofficial transcript(s) with your application. If you do not have a copy at the time of submission, you will need to log back into the system and upload them prior to the application deadline. Any applications received without a transcript will not be considered.Imperial hires talented students and new graduates from across the country. Relocation assistance is provided for successful candidates who require it.Open To All Majors:No
